Other Information.Additional Info: The Mag Zr-MOF@G6P composite selectively captures glycopeptides while excluding larger molecules such as proteins.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Captured 21 glycopeptides from HRP digests; LOD: 0.1 fmol μL−1; Selectivity ratio: up to 1:200 (HRP vs. BSA)

Other Information.Additional Info: The material combines a magnetic Fe3O4 core, a Zr-MOF layer with selective size-sieving pores, and hydrophilic glucose-6-phosphate (G6P) functionalization.
